messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Research Director's Desk
messages.body: Good day crew, I am your RD, acting Captain, How may I assist?

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Lifesign Alert

Unknown biological entities have been detected near Mad DEBUG: Crypt Victor, please stand-by.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Nanotrasen Bounty Program

Central Command has issued a high-priority cargo bounty. Details have been sent to all bounty consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Gravitational anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Security Post - Cargo Bay.

messages.author: Chief Medical Officer's Desk
messages.body: A reminder to the crew, If anything was to happen I wont be able to find you and help you without the suit sensor maxed

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Critical Power Failure

Abnormal activity detected in Mad DEBUG: Crypt Victor's powernet. As a precautionary measure, the station's power will be shut off for an indeterminate duration.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Ionospheric anomalies detected. Temporary telecommunication failu*3mga;b4;'1vï¿½-BZZZT

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Lifesign Alert

Unknown biological entities have been detected near Mad DEBUG: Crypt Victor, please stand-by.

comments.author: Soraka Makai (Chief Medical Officer)
comments.body: Dont worry, Ill keep a eye on the station with the cameras

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Atmospherics alert

The scrubbers network is experiencing an unexpected surge of pressurized beer. Some ejection of contents may occur.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Massive bluespace anomaly detected en route to Mad DEBUG:  Crypt Victor. Brace for impact.
